week.theme: SIXTH WIN! Incredible Comeback vs Sheffield United - Keep Fighting!

training.location: Mobilio West (Town Centre Park) - Grid D
training.focus: Build on comeback win mentality, maintain defensive solidity, continue clinical finishing
training.notes: Wednesday training this week - preparing for Saturday's AWAY match vs RMSC Johnson

match.preparation_focus: AWAY game vs RMSC Johnson! Coming off an incredible 2-1 comeback win. Travis C in red-hot form with 2 goals. Team showed great character fighting back from behind. Let's keep the momentum rolling!

highlights: Niko D clean sheet first half - key late saves
Owen H miraculous saves to secure the win
Travis C brace - both goals in the comeback
Andy E beautiful assist for equalizer
Rafael H went past multiple defenders for winning assist
Ethan G ideal 50-minute performance - defense and attack
Adam K and Yejun K solid defensive partnership
Short bench (missing Rhodri, David, Andrew) but never gave up

captains.duties: Lead warm-ups • Take set pieces • Guide positions • Motivate teammates
captains.training_update: Captains will be announced before the match

goalkeepers.duties: One GK in goal per 30-minute half • Non-GK plays field • Switch at half-time
goalkeepers.rotation_note: Continuing fair rotation across the squad

sideline_layout.keeper_spot: Near coach for quick switch at half

captains.match: Oct 25 vs AFC U11 B Div 3 (FIRST WIN!)
Nov 15 vs CMFSC Sheffield United (SECOND WIN!)

goalkeepers.match: Oct 25 vs AFC U11 B Div 3 (FIRST WIN!)
Nov 15 vs CMFSC Sheffield United (SECOND WIN!)
Dec 6 vs RMSC U11B10D3 Blue Lightning (FOURTH WIN!)
Jan 24 vs CMFSC Sheffield United (SIXTH WIN!)

notes.arrival: Arrive by 8:30 AM (30 min early for warm-up)
notes.coach: INCREDIBLE COMEBACK WIN! Down 0-1, we never gave up. Travis C scored twice with beautiful assists from Andy E and Rafael H. Niko kept a clean sheet in the first half with key saves. Owen made miraculous saves to protect the lead. Ethan G was everywhere for 50 minutes. Adam and Yejun were rocks in defense. Even with a short bench (missing Rhodri, David, Andrew), the team showed amazing character!
notes.match_update: NEXT MATCH: Saturday Jan 31 at 9:00am vs RMSC Johnson at Pitt Meadows Secondary 1 (AWAY).
notes.this_week: Training Wednesday, Match Saturday (AWAY). Let's make it SEVEN wins!
achievements: Sept 13 vs Millwall: Score First Goal and Team Work Goal
Sept 20 vs PCFC Wolf Pack: Excellent second half comeback
Sept 27 vs Swansea: Andy E first goal! Travis C 2 goals (beautiful free kick!)
Oct 4 vs Tones: Best defensive performance! Yejun K and David C standout games
Oct 18 vs Soccer Stars: Dominated possession 25 min (1st half) + 15 min (2nd half)
Oct 25: FIRST WIN! 4-2 victory with Adam K hat-trick & Ethan G goal
Nov 8: Andy E beautiful finish vs PCFC Thunder (Travis C assist)
Nov 15: SECOND WIN! 4-2 vs Sheffield United - Niko D penalty, Adam K brace, Travis C goal
Nov 22: THIRD WIN! 5-2 vs Middlesbrough - Travis C x2, Rafael H first goal, Ethan G, Andy E
Dec 6: FOURTH WIN! 6-2 vs Blue Lightning - Travis C hat-trick, Owen H first TWO goals!
Jan 10: Solid 2-2 draw vs Geary - Adam K brace, led twice
Jan 17: FIFTH WIN! 3-1 vs PCFC Thunder (AWAY) - Payback! Minh-An D, Ethan G x2, Rafael H 3 assists
Jan 24: SIXTH WIN! 2-1 vs Sheffield United (HOME) - COMEBACK! Travis C brace, great character shown
